metadata.title: Wednesday, 16th October, 2024
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government is aware that officers at Moyo Local Court in Pemba District have deserted the premises, thereby rendering the court non-operational;
(b) if so, what measures are being taken to resolve the problem; and
(c) when the court will be operational.
(a) why Mwansabombwe District Hospital is still experiencing loadshedding despite the President’s directive to exempt health facilities from load management; and
(b) when ZESCO Limited  will comply with the President’s directive and exempt the hospital and all health facilities, countrywide, from load management.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when the construction of Samfya Road in Lubuto Ward in Kabushi Parliamentary Constituency will commence; and
(b) what the cost of the project is.
